skilllist.skilldesc:
X.Borg's Firaga Armor inherits 160% of his Max HP. When his armor is destroyed, X.Borg rolls in the direction of the Joystick and becomes immune to damage. The armor's energy will gradually regenerate while X.Borg is in the Armorless State. At full energy, X.Borg re-equips the armor and restores it to 30%.
X.Borg's fire damage heats enemies up, causing them to enter the <font color="a6aafb">Overheated</font> state. Enemies in the <font color="a6aafb">Overheated</font> state will drop Firaga supplies when they take fire damage from X.Borg. Picking up a Firaga supply restores 10% of the Armor's HP, or 10 energy while in the Armorless state.

X.Borg sprays fire, dealing 25<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+40% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> 7 times over 2s to enemies in front of him. He deals <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font> to enemies in the <font color="a6aafb">Overheated</font> state (75% damage to minions). 

<font color="a6aafb">Armorless</font> State: The attack area becomes narrower but longer, while the damage is reduced to 60%.

X.Borg fires 5 Fire Stakes forward and recalls them after 1.7s. Each stake deals 50<font color="fba51f"> (+20% Total Physical Attack)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> and pulls enemies and Firaga Supplies along its path back to him.

Armorless State: X.Borg adjusts the Fire Stake launcher, making the stakes travel further and closer together.

X.Borg charges in the target direction while spinning and spraying flames (cannot pick up Firaga Supplies during this time), dealing 90<font color="fba51f"> (+60% Extra Physical Attack)</font> <font color="62f8fe">(+45% Total Magic Power)</font> <font color="fb1f1f">Physical Damage</font> 14 times and slowing enemies hit by 25%. He stops upon running into an enemy hero and will slow them by an additional 40%. After 3s, X.Borg's Firaga Armor detonates, dealing 300 plus 15% of the target's Max HP as <font color="ffe63c">True Damage</font>. If his armor is destroyed before it can self-detonate, it will only deal 50% of the damage. The detonation destroys his Firaga Armor, removes all debuffs, and collects all nearby Firaga Supplies.

<font color="a6aafb">Use Again</font>: X.Borg stops spraying fire and immediately detonates his Firaga Armor.

data.name: X.Borg
data.story: An uncontrollable flame that's determined to take revenge against Eruditio.

assist.desc: X.Borg pairs well with heroes who excel in burst damage, such as Karina and Martis. X.Borg's AOE damage will leave enemies low enough for his teammate to finishing off.

strong.desc: X.Borg counters Fighters that lack mobility, such as Terizla and Aulus. His 1st Skill has a large range and can be cast while moving, making it easy for him to kite.

weak.desc: X.Borg is countered by Fighters with burst damage like Martis and Dyrroth. They can quickly burst down X.Borg when he is Armorless.
